title: #082 - How to Intentionally Overcome Lazy Tendencies in Your Business with Jamie Varon
itunes:title: #082 - How to Intentionally Overcome Lazy Tendencies in Your Business with Jamie Varon
description: In our 82nd episode, we welcome Jamie Varon, Writer, Designer, and Creative Consultant living in Calabasas, California. If you have struggled with overcoming momentum issues, lazy tendencies, scheduling your time effectively, having a hard time getting things done, and feeling like you are undergoing a certain level of self-sabotage, then this is an episode that you need to hear.
